p: Chitosan concentration of 1.0% was prepared by adding the equal amount (w/v 1:100) of acetic acid to chitosan. The chitosan-acetic acid mixture was added to the total volume of distilled water and stirred overnight at room temperature. The solution was adjusted to pH 5.5 with 1N NaOH solution. Then 0.1 ml of Tween 80 was added.
